title: Has anyone actually tried comboing morg:
body:
Righteous, flash, Q, R, Exhaust, Righteous activation, W & Zhonya's; in 2 seconds?

That is some LCS sh*t.

replies.body:
no, nobody has ever done any sort of combo with morg in the history of lig of lejundz

if you somehow magically pull off this combo by the undoubtedly most difficult champ to play alongside miss fortune (both rated 10 in difficulty even by rito) you might want to self cast shield if you can remember to do this as it is very hard and even challenjour can not do this
All I see in LCS is bunnyfufu righteous'ing and missing 3 Annie ults and I do this sh*t in gold to perfection.
